document.full_text: six top members of turkey's far-right nationalist movement party (mhp) resigned on saturday over a video blackmail scandal, fuelling uncertainty about the outcome of the june 12 parliamentary election.
document.title: pre-election resignations rock turkish far right
lines_and_colors: six top members of turkey's far-right nationalist movement party (mhp) resigned on saturday over a video blackmail scandal, fuelling uncertainty about the outcome of the june 12 parliamentary election.
